Loveless grew up in on a farm in eastern Ohio with readymade bandmates in her drummer dad and two sisters. Now that the initial thrum of success has passed, Loveless mines the experiences she shelved during the trials of becoming of a rising musician. Somewhere Else may have the finesse of a professional with many years on the books, but it also has the languor that accompanies an amateur treading on uneven ground.
